data.title: David Ferrer - 2009 - Baseball
data.meta_description:
David Ferrer (35) Right-Handed Pitcher  - 2009
Made ten appearances during his junior year, including one start against Alabama State...Pitched 15.1 innings, striking
data.text:
2009

Made ten appearances during his junior year, including one start against Alabama State...Pitched 15.1 innings, striking out 15...Earned one appearance in the Panthers run through the CAA Championship, throwing 1.1 innings of the championship game...Threw a career-high three innings of relief against UT-Martin on March 13th...Earned a career-high four strikeouts against Savannah State on March 18th.

2008

Tied for second on team with 19 appearances ... Struck out a career-high two batters six times ... Registered first career win with two innings and a pair of strikeouts against Jackson State (2/23) ... Earned first career save in 1.1-inning outing against IPFW (3/1) ... Picked up save with a bases-loaded strikeout against George Mason (3/14) ... Garnered save with two scoreless innings against Jacksonville State (3/18) ... Earned win with 1.2 innings of work against William & Mary (4/6).

2007

Struck out two in a season-high two-inning relief appearance in win against Mississippi Valley State (3/2) ... Gave up one run in 1.2 innings of relief against James Madison (4/27) ... Surrendered one run in 1.1 innings against Jacksonville State (5/8).

2006

Made five appearances before sustaining an injury and earning a medical hardship waiver ... Pitched a scoreless inning, allowing one hit and striking out two against Albany (2/17) ... Threw 1.1 innings scoreless innings against Mercer (3/28).

Prep

Graduated from McEachern High School where he played baseball for the Indians ... His senior season he struck out 52 batters while walking only eight in 53 innings pitched ... Finished the season with a 2.46 ERA while leading his team to the first round of the state playoffs ... Named to the Atlanta West All-Star team for his efforts, and earned Second-Team All-Cobb County honors.
